Body:
Description: Hello Team,

Kindly delete all old shadows backups up to April.

What We've Learned Updated: 2025.05.06
I have done the procedure via the backend to delete all file shadows older than 20th April 2025 and have freed  119 GB (67%) of the EPP appliance disk space.

Next Steps Updated: 2025.05.06
Customer needs to let us know if they have any questions or need further assistance.  If not then the case can be closed.

Next Steps Updated: 2025.05.06
Customer needs to let us know if they have any questions or need further assistance.  If not then the case can be closed.
